text: Acadoparadoxides is an extinct genus of redlichiid trilobite belonging to the family Paradoxididae. These fast-moving low-level epifaunal carnivores lived in the Middle Cambrian (abt 535 Ma). ==Selected species== The following species have been described: ==References== Category:Redlichiida genera Category:Paradoxidoidea Category:Cambrian trilobites Category:Prehistoric life of Europe Category:Fossil taxa described in 1957
title: Acadoparadoxides
